impulse_reverb.name: Impulse Reverb
impulse_reverb.description:
This plugin performs highly optimized real time zero-latency convolution
to the input signal. It can be used as a cabinet emulator, some sort of
equalizer or as a reverb simulation plugin. All what is needed is audio
file(s) with impulse response taken from the linear system (cabinet, equalizer
or hall/room). The flexible configuration allows to use True Reverb processing.
